modules.description: Returns the dimensions and channel count of an image specification, and retrieves the base data type used. Operates on image specifications and attributes, allowing storage and retrieval of named metadata. Constructs new specifications with defined color types, width, and height.

Initializes a data source from a string, retrieves configuration specifications, and reads image data with precise type annotations. It operates on a custom type `t` and image types from the Bimage library, supporting RGB color formats. Used to load and process images from specified sources with error handling.

Creates and manages output streams, supporting writing of image data in various color formats. Operates on a stream type and image types with specific color spaces. Used to save images to files with customizable specifications and append mode.

Provides functions for loading, saving, and manipulating images using bigarrays as the underlying data structure. Includes operations for pixel-wise transformations, color space conversions, and basic image filtering. Used to process raw image data in applications such as computer vision pipelines and graphical user interfaces.

Provides functions to inspect and construct image specifications, read and write image data with type-specific handling, and manage input/output streams for image files. It works with image specifications, data sources, and output streams, supporting operations like retrieving dimensions, loading images with RGB formats, and saving images with custom settings. The module enables metadata management, precise data loading, and flexible image output. Examples include determining image size, loading from a string, and saving in a specified color space.
